title: Game Stories - Basic layout
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Home Surface
custom_steps: WHEN they view the content on the Home Surface
custom_expected:
THEN they will see a horizontally scrollable content carousel at the top of the Home Surface labeled “Game Stories”
AND each thumbnail will display a team/team logo for each game on the schedule

title: Game Stories - Live game story layout
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a “live” Game Story for a day
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Home Surface
custom_expected: THEN the Game Story for the “live” game will be displayed

title: Game Stories - No live game story layout
custom_preconds: GIVEN there are no “live” Game Stories for a day
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters the Home Surface
custom_expected: THEN the Game Stories content module will not be displayed

title: Game Stories - Thumbnail tap functionality
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Game Story is displayed on the Home Surface
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a Game Story thumbnail
custom_expected:
THEN the Minutely Game Story webview is displayed
AND the user can tap through the slides
AND the user can close out of the Game Story

title: Game Stories - General functionality
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Home Page
custom_steps: WHEN the Game Stories carousel is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN it will have the following features:

- Vertical portrait style cards that will display the team logo and team color in a team vs team slash style
- “Game Stories” header text and logo will display above the vertical cards
- The vertical cards will be presented in a horizontal scroll
- Three/four cards will initially show with then next card in the list peaking into view

title: Game Stories - Pre-game state
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Game Stories carousel
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in the pregame state
custom_expected: THEN the game time (first pitch) will be displayed in a badge on the card

title: Game Stories - In-progress state
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Game Stories carousel
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in progress
custom_expected: THEN the inning will be displayed on the card

title: Game Stories - Final state
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Game Stories carousel
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in a final state
custom_expected: THEN a “Final” badge will be displayed on the card

title: Game Stories - Card sort order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Home page
AND the user has a favorite/follow team set
custom_steps: WHEN the Game Stories Carousel is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN the cards will be sorted in the following order (from left to right):

1. Favorite Team
2. Followed Team(s) 
3. Chronologic game time order

title: Game Stories - Day parting
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Home page
custom_steps: WHEN the Game Stories carousel is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN games will display according to the following rules:

- Before 10AM ET (utilize the scoreboard flip logic if possible) Yesterday’s Games Stories will be displayed 
- If there are no game stories yesterday, only Today will displayed
- After 10AM ET - Today’s Game Stories will be displayed

title: Game Stories - Carousel placement
custom_expected:
THEN the Game stories carousel position will be determined by a tbd config setting

Note: The placement of the module should be independent of other modules but may initially start at the top of the home feed view.

title: Game Stories - Team colors
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Home feed
custom_steps: WHEN the Game Stories carousel is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN the team colors will match the following docs:

https://www.figma.com/file/Pa65awl0GEWEqiPax9DBvZ/Club-Logos%2C-Colors-%26-Branding?node-id=765%3A5589
